https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tmY7nN4VoJ10lZk0nHkR71KIvk3.jpg The NPF, a women's professional softball league that few know exists, has spent decades struggling for survival in a male-dominated sports world. Its players are forced to choose between their livelihood and their dreams, and this year they've been given another chance. Burn the Ships
